Well Guys I just tried to post a comment not begin a war here. I 
jusnt can't understand why are you arguing this time.

And I would rather that people here help me to improve my writting 
english, than no body tell me about. Hey ! My penpals and the people 
with whom I chat correct me often my writting English, can you tell 
me how can I improve my english if nobody tell me my mistakes?
